textBeforeTable: For up to 18 guests Prices originally quoted in GBP United Kingdom Pounds Convert to AUD ($) Australian dollars CAD ($) Canadian dollars CHF (CHF) Swiss francs EUR (€) Euro GBP (£) United Kingdom pounds SEK (Skr) Swedish Krona THB (฿) Thai baht USD ($) United States dollars ZAR (R) South African rand Prices
textAfterTable: Please note: these prices may exclude fees and can vary depending on when you stay and how long for. Prices are also subject to change at the advertiser’s discretion. 10^ holding deposit is required. bed linen, hand and shower towels, preparation of villa beds made, swimming pool maintenance 2x a week ,daily concierge service, gardener 2x a week, is included in the price AC/HA is on a coin meter and approx 2 euro will cover 5 hours use per bedroom per night. There is a compulsory fee for 2 week stay for Mid light clean of €70, Mid Linen change €50. All bookings carries a Departure clean of €20 per person, payable upon arrival. The villa is priced for up to 18 persons inc children.Discounts may be available for 12 or less, out of season. Returnable Security deposit of £900,(less any damage) Guests under 25 are not accepted without elder Adults present.Airport transfers available Alicante or Valencia To hold villa 10% deposit is payable immediately, 50% of balance Jan 2013, Final Balance 2 months prior.No cancellation fees are offered if not cancelled before 6 months prior to the booking . Our 3 bedroom villa next door, with separate swimming pool, called "Sharonade" can accommodate another 8 persons, so if you wanted up to a total of 26 persons staying we are able to help you. Inquire for prices Conditions to hold the Villa a 10% deposit is required with Two 50% payments of the balance
